    Class
    Description
    BindInfo
    BindInfo objects allow you to fine-tune or override how values should be bound into a PreparedStatement.
    KlojangSQLException
    A RuntimeException that may either wrap an SQLException or indicate another error condition while processing or executing SQL.
    ResultSetBeanifier
    Converts the rows in a JDBC result sets into JavaBeans.
    ResultSetMappifier
    Converts rows in a JDBC ResultSet into Map<String, Object> instances.
